MORE PIKMIN

Pikmins are the best they are hard workers!

Pikmins help Olimar explore the fars lands that need to be discovered

The player controls Captain Olimar, an alien who ends up on a mysterious planet, where he becomes friend that are called pikmin, and utilizes their abilities to collect items.

Best Pikmin Games

pikmin 1 box art

first game to come out

pikmin 2 box art

best game in my opinion

pikmin 3 box art

lastest game to come out

There are many type of Pikmins

Here are a few from the original game

Learn More

Red Pikmin

Aside from their color, the different feature of Red Pikmin is their pointed noses. These Pikmin possess are immune to fire

Yellow Pikmin

The Yellow Pikmin are the lightest Pikmin type and can be thrown at higher altitudes than other Pikmin, also immune to eletric

Blue Pikmin

these Pikmin are different from other Pikmin species because they have mouths, a trait seen in no other Pikmin species, also can breath in water

Purple Pikmin

These Pikmin are very strong due to their weight and are the most durable out of all Pikmin Types, can also carry the most out of all the pikmins

White Pikmin

They are distinguished by their red eyes, pure color, and are really small, also immuned to poison
